akrsh47/Expense-Tracker.summary: Recent activities in the Expense-Tracker repository include updates to the styling and confirmation method for the delete button, as well as an update to the README file, and the addition of a feature to download expenses as a PDF using a CDN, demonstrating ongoing efforts to enhance functionality and user experience.

akrsh47/Sudoku-app.summary: The Sudoku-app repository has seen significant updates, including the addition of an about page, implementation of media queries for improved responsiveness, and a redesign of the home screen UI, indicating a focus on expanding features and refining the user interface.

profile_summary:
Akarsh Balachandran is a highly skilled and accomplished developer with a strong foundation in JavaScript and CSS. With a keen eye for detail and a passion for innovation, he has established himself as a reliable and results-driven professional in the field of web development. His extensive experience and expertise in coding languages have enabled him to deliver high-quality solutions that meet the needs of his clients and exceed their expectations. As a dedicated and forward-thinking developer, Akarsh is committed to staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, ensuring that his skills and knowledge remain current and relevant.

With a growing professional network of followers and a portfolio of seven public repositories, Akarsh has demonstrated his ability to collaborate with others and share his knowledge and expertise with the wider development community. His commit history and project contributions showcase his technical prowess and attention to detail, making him a valuable asset to any development team. As a talented and driven developer, Akarsh is well-positioned to drive innovation and deliver exceptional results in his future endeavors, and his unique blend of technical skills and professional experience make him an attractive candidate for companies seeking a skilled and dedicated web development professional.
